fields.title: monstera deliciosa
fields.description: Monstera is a favourite plant for most plant-parents. It is also a great choice for the beginner.

fields.title: ficus 'robusta'
fields.description: Looking for a green houseplant that is not demanding and grows rapidly? Say no more!

fields.title: snake plant
fields.description: Snake plants help to filter indoor air. This quality makes it an ideal plant for bedroom decor.

fields.title: hebe plants
fields.description: Many people choose Hebe because of their ease of care and versatility. They are great as potted plants or for landscaping.

fields.title: Lily 'Stargazer'
fields.description: The Lily ‘Stargazer’ Pink is just beautiful! It can be grown outdoors as a focal point in your garden or indoors as a potted plant.

fields.title: Orange Tree
fields.description: Grow your very own oranges with our Citrus Tree! These small shrubs will look amazing both inside and outside your home.
